attrs.name: show-img
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display the avatar. The default value is true.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: show-name
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display userName. The default value is true.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: show-number
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display the employee ID roleNumber. The default value is true.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the popper. For details, see the popover component.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert a pop-up box to the body element. If a fault occurs in locating the fault in the dialog box that is displayed, you can set this attribute to false (for details, see the select component).
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.
